blocks.name: nepss
blocks.content: Two classes are unequal iff their intersection is a proper subset of one of them. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 23-Feb-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm nepss(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wne(c0, c1), wo(wpss(cin(c0, c1), c0), wpss(cin(c0, c1), c1)))
} = {
  bitr4i(wne(c0, c1), wo(wpss(cin(c0, c1), c0), wpss(cin(c0, c1), c1)), wo(wa(wss(cin(c0, c1), c0), wne(cin(c0, c1), c0)), wa(wss(cin(c0, c1), c1), wne(cin(c0, c1), c1))))
  impbii(wne(c0, c1), wo(wa(wss(cin(c0, c1), c0), wne(cin(c0, c1), c0)), wa(wss(cin(c0, c1), c1), wne(cin(c0, c1), c1))))
  syl(wne(c0, c1), wo(wa(wss(cin(c0, c1), c0), wne(cin(c0, c1), c0)), wa(wss(cin(c0, c1), c1), wne(cin(c0, c1), c1))), wo(wne(cin(c0, c1), c0), wne(cin(c0, c1), c1)))
  orrd(wne(c0, c1), wne(cin(c0, c1), c0), wne(cin(c0, c1), c1))
  syl5bi(wne(c0, c1), wn(wne(cin(c0, c1), c0)), wne(cin(c0, c1), c1), wceq(cin(c0, c1), c0))
  nne(cin(c0, c1), c0)
  biimprcd(wne(c0, c1), wceq(cin(c0, c1), c0), wne(cin(c0, c1), c1))
  neeq1(cin(c0, c1), c0, c1)
  orim12i(wne(cin(c0, c1), c0), wne(cin(c0, c1), c1), wa(wss(cin(c0, c1), c0), wne(cin(c0, c1), c0)), wa(wss(cin(c0, c1), c1), wne(cin(c0, c1), c1)))
  jctl(wne(cin(c0, c1), c0), wss(cin(c0, c1), c0))
  inss1(c0, c1)
  jctl(wne(cin(c0, c1), c1), wss(cin(c0, c1), c1))
  inss2(c0, c1)
  jaoi(wa(wss(cin(c0, c1), c0), wne(cin(c0, c1), c0)), wa(wss(cin(c0, c1), c1), wne(cin(c0, c1), c1)), wne(c0, c1))
  adantl(wss(cin(c0, c1), c0), wne(cin(c0, c1), c0), wne(c0, c1))
  necon3i(cin(c0, c1), c0, c0, c1)
  syl5reqr(cin(c0, c1), c0, cin(c0, c0), wceq(c0, c1))
  inidm(c0)
  ineq2(c0, c1, c0)
  adantl(wss(cin(c0, c1), c1), wne(cin(c0, c1), c1), wne(c0, c1))
  necon3i(cin(c0, c1), c1, c0, c1)
  syl6eq(cin(c0, c1), c1, cin(c1, c1), wceq(c0, c1))
  ineq1(c0, c1, c1)
  inidm(c1)
  orbi12i(wpss(cin(c0, c1), c0), wpss(cin(c0, c1), c1), wa(wss(cin(c0, c1), c0), wne(cin(c0, c1), c0)), wa(wss(cin(c0, c1), c1), wne(cin(c0, c1), c1)))
  df-pss(cin(c0, c1), c0)
  df-pss(cin(c0, c1), c1)
}

blocks.name: 3ccased
blocks.content: Triple disjunction form of ~ ccased . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 27-Oct-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Apr-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm 3ccased(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4, wff w5, wff w6, wff w7) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wa(w3o(w1, w2, w3), w3o(w4, w5, w6)), w7))
  -| wi(w0, wi(wa(w1, w4), w7))
  -| wi(w0, wi(wa(w1, w5), w7))
  -| wi(w0, wi(wa(w1, w6), w7))
  -| wi(w0, wi(wa(w2, w4), w7))
  -| wi(w0, wi(wa(w2, w5), w7))
  -| wi(w0, wi(wa(w2, w6), w7))
  -| wi(w0, wi(wa(w3, w4), w7))
  -| wi(w0, wi(wa(w3, w5), w7))
  -| wi(w0, wi(wa(w3, w6), w7))
} = {
  com12(w0, wa(w3o(w1, w2, w3), w3o(w4, w5, w6)), w7)
  3jaoian(w1, w2, w3, w3o(w4, w5, w6), wi(w0, w7))
  3jaodan(w1, w4, w5, w6, wi(w0, w7))
  com12(wa(w1, w4), w0, w7)
  com12(wa(w1, w5), w0, w7)
  com12(wa(w1, w6), w0, w7)
  3jaodan(w2, w4, w5, w6, wi(w0, w7))
  com12(wa(w2, w4), w0, w7)
  com12(wa(w2, w5), w0, w7)
  com12(wa(w2, w6), w0, w7)
  3jaodan(w3, w4, w5, w6, wi(w0, w7))
  com12(wa(w3, w4), w0, w7)
  com12(wa(w3, w5), w0, w7)
  com12(wa(w3, w6), w0, w7)
}

blocks.name: dfso3
blocks.content: Expansion of the definition of a strict order. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 6-Jun-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfso3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wor(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c1, w3a(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), w3o(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  3bitr4ri(wor(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c1, w3a(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), w3o(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c1, wa(wa(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))), w3o(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wral(s2, c1, wa(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))))), w3o(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))))
  ralbii(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c1, wa(wa(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))), w3o(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))), wral(s1, c1, wa(wral(s2, c1, wa(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))))), w3o(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))
  ralbiia(s1, c1, wral(s2, c1, wa(wa(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))), w3o(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))), wa(wral(s2, c1, wa(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))))), w3o(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  syl(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wb(wral(s2, c1, wa(wa(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))), w3o(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))), wa(wral(s2, c1, wa(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))))), w3o(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))), wne(c1, emptycls))
  ne0i(cv(s1), c1)
  r19.27zv(s2, c1, wa(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))), w3o(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  2ralbii(s0, s1, c1, c1, wral(s2, c1, w3a(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), w3o(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))), wral(s2, c1, wa(wa(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))), w3o(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))
  ralbii(s2, c1, w3a(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), w3o(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), wa(wa(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2)))), w3o(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))
  df-3an(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))), w3o(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  3bitr4i(wor(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wa(wral(s2, c1, wa(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))))), w3o(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))), wa(wpo(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, w3o(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))), wa(wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c1, wa(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))))))), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, w3o(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))))))
  anbi1i(wpo(c0, c1), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, w3o(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c1, wa(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))))))))
  df-po(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1)
  df-so(s0, s1, c0, c1)
  r19.26-2(s0, s1, c1, c1, wral(s2, c1, wa(wn(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))), wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s2))))), w3o(wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  diff.w3o.s(s2, wbr(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  diff.wbr.s(s2, cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.wbr.s(s2, cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}

blocks.name: brtpid1
blocks.content: A binary relation involving unordered triplets. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 7-Jun-2016.)

blocks.name: brtpid2
blocks.content: A binary relation involving unordered triplets. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 7-Jun-2016.)

blocks.name: brtpid3
blocks.content: A binary relation involving unordered triplets. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 7-Jun-2016.)

blocks.name: ceqsrexv2
blocks.content: Alternate elimitation of a restricted existential quantifier, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 5-Sep-2017.)

blocks.name: iota5f
blocks.content: A method for computing iota. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 13-Dec-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm iota5f(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(cio(s0, w1), c0))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wb(w1, wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  mpd(wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(cio(s0, w1), c0), wal(s0, wb(w1, wceq(cv(s0), c0))))
  alrimi(s0, wa(w0, wcel(c0, c1)), wb(w1, wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
  nfan(s0, w0, wcel(c0, c1))
  nfel1(s0, c0, c1)
  adantl(w0, wcel(c0, c1), wi(wal(s0, wb(w1, wceq(cv(s0), c0))), wceq(cio(s0, w1), c0)))
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, c1, wi(wal(s0, wb(w1, wceq(cv(s0), c0))), wceq(cio(s0, w1), c0)), wi(wal(s0, wb(w1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), wceq(cio(s0, w1), cv(hs0))))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wal(s0, wb(w1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))), wceq(cio(s0, w1), cv(hs0)), wal(s0, wb(w1, wceq(cv(s0), c0))), wceq(cio(s0, w1), c0))
  albid(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wb(w1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))), wb(w1, wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
  nfeq2(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  bibi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), w1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  eqeq2(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))
  eqeq2(cv(hs0), c0, cio(s0, w1))
  iotaval(s0, hs0, w1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wal(s0, wb(w1, wceq(cv(s0), c0))), wceq(cio(s0, w1), c0)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm iota5f(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ ((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1)→ iota(s0, w1)= c0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1)→(w1 ↔ s0 = c0))
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  mpd((w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1), iota(s0, w1)= c0, ∀(s0,(w1 ↔ s0 = c0)))
  alrimi(s0, (w0 ∧ c0 ∈ c1), (w1 ↔ s0 = c0))
  nfan(s0, w0, c0 ∈ c1)
  nfel1(s0, c0, c1)
  adantl(w0, c0 ∈ c1, (∀(s0,(w1 ↔ s0 = c0))→ iota(s0, w1)= c0))
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, c1, (∀(s0,(w1 ↔ s0 = c0))→ iota(s0, w1)= c0), (∀(s0,(w1 ↔ s0 = hs0))→ iota(s0, w1)= hs0))
  imbi12d(hs0 = c0, ∀(s0,(w1 ↔ s0 = hs0)), iota(s0, w1)= hs0, ∀(s0,(w1 ↔ s0 = c0)), iota(s0, w1)= c0)
  albid(s0, hs0 = c0, (w1 ↔ s0 = hs0), (w1 ↔ s0 = c0))
  nfeq2(s0, hs0, c0)
  bibi2d(hs0 = c0, w1, s0 = hs0, s0 = c0)
  eqeq2(hs0, c0, s0)
  eqeq2(hs0, c0, iota(s0, w1))
  iotaval(s0, hs0, w1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((∀(s0,(w1 ↔ s0 = c0))→ iota(s0, w1)= c0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: ceqsralv2
blocks.content: Alternate elimination of a restricted universal quantifier, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 7-Dec-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm ceqsralv2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wral(s0, c0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), w0)), wi(wcel(c1, c0), w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
} = {
  con4bii(wral(s0, c0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), w0)), wi(wcel(c1, c0), w1))
  3bitr3i(wn(wral(s0, c0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), w0))), wn(wi(wcel(c1, c0), w1)), wrex(s0, c0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wn(w0))), wa(wcel(c1, c0), wn(w1)))
  ceqsrexv2(s0, c0, c1, wn(w0), wn(w1))
  notbid(wceq(cv(s0), c1), w0, w1)
  rexanali(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s0), c1), w0)
  annim(wcel(c1, c0), w1)
  diff.wn.s(s0, w1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ceqsralv2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0 ∈ c0,(s0 = c1 → w0))↔(c1 ∈ c0 → w1))
  ⊣ (s0 = c1 →(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w1)
} = {
  con4bii(∀(s0 ∈ c0,(s0 = c1 → w0)), (c1 ∈ c0 → w1))
  3bitr3i(¬ ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(s0 = c1 → w0)), ¬(c1 ∈ c0 → w1), ∃(s0 ∈ c0,(s0 = c1 ∧ ¬ w0)), (c1 ∈ c0 ∧ ¬ w1))
  ceqsrexv2(s0, c0, c1, ¬ w0, ¬ w1)
  notbid(s0 = c1, w0, w1)
  rexanali(s0, c0, s0 = c1, w0)
  annim(c1 ∈ c0, w1)
  diff.wn.s(s0, w1)
}

blocks.name: dford5
blocks.content: A class is ordinal iff it is a subclass of ` On ` and transitive. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 21-Nov-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm dford5(class c0) {
  |- wb(word(c0), wa(wss(c0, con0), wtr(c0)))
} = {
  impbii(word(c0), wa(wss(c0, con0), wtr(c0)))
  jca(word(c0), wss(c0, con0), wtr(c0))
  ordsson(c0)
  ordtr(c0)
  sylan(wss(c0, con0), wtr(c0), word(c0), wwe(cep, c0))
  mpi(wss(c0, con0), wwe(cep, c0), wwe(cep, con0))
  epweon()
  wess(c0, con0, cep)
  ancoms(wwe(cep, c0), wtr(c0), word(c0))
  biimpri(wa(wtr(c0), wwe(cep, c0)), word(c0))
  df-ord(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dford5(class c0) {
  ⊢ (Ord(c0)↔(c0 ⊆ On ∧ Tr(c0)))
} = {
  impbii(Ord(c0), (c0 ⊆ On ∧ Tr(c0)))
  jca(Ord(c0), c0 ⊆ On, Tr(c0))
  ordsson(c0)
  ordtr(c0)
  sylan(c0 ⊆ On, Tr(c0), Ord(c0), ∈ ≤ c0)
  mpi(c0 ⊆ On, ∈ ≤ c0, ∈ ≤ On)
  epweon()
  wess(c0, con0, cep)
  ancoms(∈ ≤ c0, Tr(c0), Ord(c0))
  biimpri((Tr(c0)∧ ∈ ≤ c0), Ord(c0))
  df-ord(c0)
}

blocks.name: jath
blocks.content: Closed form of ~ ja . Proved using the completeness script. (Proof modification is discouraged.) (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 13-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm jath(wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))
} = {
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))), wi(wn(w0), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))))
  ax-mp(wi(wn(w0), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))), wi(wn(w0), wi(wn(w1), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))))))
  ax-mp(wi(wn(w0), wi(wn(w1), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))))), wi(wn(w0), wi(wn(w1), wn(wi(wn(w0), w1)))))
  mth8(wn(w0), w1)
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wn(w0), wi(wn(w1), wn(wi(wn(w0), w1)))), wi(wn(w0), wi(wn(w1), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))))), wi(wi(wn(w1), wn(wi(wn(w0), w1))), wi(wn(w1), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))))))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wn(w1), wn(wi(wn(w0), w1))), wi(wn(w1), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))))), wi(wn(wi(wn(w0), w1)), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))))
  pm2.21(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))
  imim2(wn(wi(wn(w0), w1)), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))), wn(w1))
  imim2(wi(wn(w1), wn(wi(wn(w0), w1))), wi(wn(w1), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))), wn(w0))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wn(w0), wi(wn(w1), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))))), wi(wn(w0), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))))), wi(wi(wn(w1), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))))
  imim2(wi(wn(w1), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))), wn(w0))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wn(w0), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))), wi(w0, wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))))
  ax-mp(wi(w0, wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))), wi(w0, wi(wn(w2), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))))))
  ax-mp(wi(w0, wi(wn(w2), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))))), wi(w0, wi(wn(w2), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))))
  ax-mp(wi(w0, wi(wn(w2), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))), wi(w0, wi(wn(w2), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))))
  ax-mp(wi(w0, wi(wn(w2), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))), wi(w0, wi(wn(w2), wn(wi(w0, w2)))))
  mth8(w0, w2)
  ax-mp(wi(wi(w0, wi(wn(w2), wn(wi(w0, w2)))), wi(w0, wi(wn(w2), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))), wi(wi(wn(w2), wn(wi(w0, w2))), wi(wn(w2), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wn(w2), wn(wi(w0, w2))), wi(wn(w2), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))), wi(wn(wi(w0, w2)), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))
  pm2.21(wi(w0, w2), w1)
  imim2(wn(wi(w0, w2)), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1), wn(w2))
  imim2(wi(wn(w2), wn(wi(w0, w2))), wi(wn(w2), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)), w0)
  ax-mp(wi(wi(w0, wi(wn(w2), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))), wi(w0, wi(wn(w2), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))))), wi(wi(wn(w2), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)), wi(wn(w2), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wn(w2), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)), wi(wn(w2), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))), wi(wi(wi(w0, w2), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))))
  imim2(wi(wi(w0, w2), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)), wn(w2))
  imim2(wi(wn(w2), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)), wi(wn(w2), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))), w0)
  ax-mp(wi(wi(w0, wi(wn(w2), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))), wi(w0, wi(wn(w2), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))))), wi(wi(wn(w2), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))), wi(wn(w2), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))))))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wn(w2), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))), wi(wn(w2), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))))), wi(wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))))
  imim2(wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))), wn(w2))
  imim2(wi(wn(w2), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))), wi(wn(w2), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))), w0)
  ax-mp(wi(wi(w0, wi(wn(w2), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))))), wi(w0, wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))))), wi(wi(wn(w2), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wn(w2), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))), wi(w2, wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))))
  ax-mp(wi(w2, wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))), wi(w2, wi(wn(w1), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))))))
  ax-mp(wi(w2, wi(wn(w1), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))))), wi(w2, wi(wn(w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))))
  ax-mp(wi(w2, wi(wn(w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))), wi(w2, wi(wn(w1), wn(wi(w2, w1)))))
  mth8(w2, w1)
  ax-mp(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(w1), wn(wi(w2, w1)))), wi(w2, wi(wn(w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))))), wi(wi(wn(w1), wn(wi(w2, w1))), wi(wn(w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wn(w1), wn(wi(w2, w1))), wi(wn(w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))), wi(wn(wi(w2, w1)), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))))
  pm2.21(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))
  imim2(wn(wi(w2, w1)), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)), wn(w1))
  imim2(wi(wn(w1), wn(wi(w2, w1))), wi(wn(w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))), w2)
  ax-mp(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))), wi(w2, wi(wn(w1), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))))), wi(wi(wn(w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))), wi(wn(w1), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))))))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wn(w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))), wi(wn(w1), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))))), wi(wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))))
  imim2(wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))), wn(w1))
  imim2(wi(wn(w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))), wi(wn(w1), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))), w2)
  ax-mp(wi(wi(w2, wi(wn(w1), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))))), wi(w2, wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))))), wi(wi(wn(w1), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(wn(w1), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))), wi(w1, wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))))
  ax-mp(wi(w1, wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))), wi(w1, wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))))
  ax-mp(wi(w1, wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))), wi(w1, wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))
  ax-1(w1, wi(w0, w2))
  ax-mp(wi(wi(w1, wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)), wi(w1, wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))), wi(wi(wi(w0, w2), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))))
  ax-1(wi(wi(w0, w2), w1), wi(w2, w1))
  imim2(wi(wi(w0, w2), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)), w1)
  ax-mp(wi(wi(w1, wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))), wi(w1, wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))))), wi(wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))))
  ax-1(wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)), wi(wn(w0), w1))
  imim2(wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))), w1)
  pm2.61(w1, wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))))
  imim2(wi(wn(w1), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1)))), wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))), w2)
  pm2.61(w2, wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))))

  pm2.61(w0, wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), wi(wi(w2, w1), wi(wi(w0, w2), w1))))
}
